page.name: National Business Honor Society
page.description: An honor society dedicated to members passionate about business!
page.sectionTwoContent: In addition to the application process, here are some of the requirements: a student must be a high school junior or senior.  The student must have completed or be currently enrolled in his/her third business course and must complete a business course each year of membership. The student must have a minimum standard GPA, on a 4.0 scale, as follows: business courses average-3.6; overall average-3.65.
